001package andesite;
002
003import andesite.handler.WebSocketState;
004import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager;
005import io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject;
006import io.vertx.ext.web.Router;
007import io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext;
008
009import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
010import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
011
012/**
013 * Entry point for a plugin. Defines the callbacks used to modify the node state
014 * or intercept commands.
015 */
016public interface Plugin {
017    /**
018     * Called when plugin loading is complete. This method is the first callback to be called
019     * and is guaranteed to run only once.
020     *
021     * <br><br>Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
022     *
023     * @param state State of the node.
024     *
025     * @see NodeState
026     */
027    default void init(@Nonnull NodeState state) {}
028    
029    /**
030     * Called to allow configuration of an audio player manager. May be called more than once with
031     * different player managers.
032     *
033     * <br><b>Plugins should not change the output format of the manager.</b>
034     *
035     * <br><br>Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
036     *
037     * @param state   State of the node.
038     * @param manager Player manager to configure.
039     *
040     * @see NodeState
041     * @see AudioPlayerManager
042     */
043    default void configurePlayerManager(@Nonnull NodeState state, @Nonnull AudioPlayerManager manager) {}
044    
045    /**
046     * Whether or not this plugin requires a router to work. If this returns true,
047     * a router will always be created, regardless of other settings. This
048     * method might not be called.
049     *
050     * <br>Even if this returns false, a router may still be created and
051     * {@link #configureRouter(NodeState, Router) configureRouter()} may
052     * be called. Returning true only ensures the creation, returning false
053     * doesn't stop it.
054     *
055     * <br>A router will be created if any of these conditions are met
056     * <ul>
057     * <li>HTTP or WebSocket transports are enabled</li>
058     * <li>Prometheus metrics are enabled</li>
059     * <li><b>Any</b> plugins returns true on this method</li>
060     * </ul>
061     *
062     * <br><br>Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
063     *
064     * @return Whether or not this plugin requires a router.
065     */
066    default boolean requiresRouter() {
067        return false;
068    }
069    
070    /**
071     * Called to allow injecting custom routes on the provided router.
072     * Only called if the HTTP server is enabled (see {@link #requiresRouter() requiresRouter()}
073     * for HTTP server creation conditions).
074     *
075     * <br><br>Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
076     *
077     * @param state  State of the node.
078     * @param router Root router used by the node.
079     *
080     * @see NodeState
081     * @see Router
082     */
083    default void configureRouter(@Nonnull NodeState state, @Nonnull Router router) {}
084    
085    /**
086     * Starts custom listeners for this plugin. If the default listeners are disabled
087     * and no plugin has custom listeners, the process will exit.
088     *
089     * <br><br>Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
090     *
091     * @param state State of the node.
092     *
093     * @return True if a listener was started.
094     *
095     * @see NodeState
096     */
097    default boolean startListeners(@Nonnull NodeState state) {
098        return false;
099    }
100    
101    /**
102     * Called when a REST request is received. Runs on the event loop, so <b>blocking should be avoided.</b>
103     *
104     * @param state   State of the node.
105     * @param context Context for the request.
106     *
107     * @return Whether or not other handlers should be called.
108     *
109     * @see NodeState
110     * @see RoutingContext
111     * @see HookResult
112     */
113    @Nonnull
114    @CheckReturnValue
115    default HookResult onRawHttpRequest(@Nonnull NodeState state, @Nonnull RoutingContext context) {
116        return HookResult.CALL_NEXT;
117    }
118    
119    /**
120     * Called when a websocket payload is received. Runs on the event loop, so <b>blocking should be avoided.</b>
121     *
122     * @param nodeState State of the node.
123     * @param wsState   State of the websocket connection.
124     * @param payload   Payload received.
125     *
126     * @return Whether or not other handlers should be called.
127     *
128     * @see NodeState
129     * @see andesite.handler.WebSocketState
130     * @see HookResult
131     */
132    @Nonnull
133    @CheckReturnValue
134    default HookResult onRawWebSocketPayload(@Nonnull NodeState nodeState, @Nonnull WebSocketState wsState, @Nonnull JsonObject payload) {
135        return HookResult.CALL_NEXT;
136    }
137    
138    /**
139     * Used to signal whether or not a payload should be dropped.
140     *
141     * Dropping a payload allows overriding other handlers or blocking a client.
142     */
143    enum HookResult {
144        /**
145         * Call next plugin, or the default andesite code if no more
146         * plugins remain.
147         */
148        CALL_NEXT,
149        /**
150         * Ignore this event.
151         */
152        ABORT
153    }
154}
